subTitle: Clean. Clear. Conversion Ready.
faq_subtitle: Everything you need to know about getting started
reviews_subtitle: Join hundreds of service businesses already online

reviews.name: Sarah M.
reviews.text: Set up my detailing site in under 10 minutes. Already getting bookings!

reviews.name: Mike J.
reviews.text: The SEO tools alone are worth it. Ranking on first page already.

reviews.name: Lisa K.
reviews.text: Beautiful templates, easy customization. My customers love the booking system.

faqs.question: How quickly can I launch my site?
faqs.answer: Most businesses are live within 15 minutes. Just fill in your info, pick your industry, and deploy.

faqs.question: Can I customize the design?
faqs.answer: Yes! Upload your logo, choose colors, add your images. Full branding control.

faqs.question: What industries do you support?
faqs.answer: Mobile detailing, lawn care, maid service, pet grooming, barber shops, and more. New industries added regularly.

faqs.question: Is SEO included?
faqs.answer: Every site includes structured data, meta tags, sitemaps, and fast load times. Built for local search.
